trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma vista de tempo de criação de dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView> with the provided data source designer.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView>com o estruturador de origens de dados fornecido.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Design.EntityDesignerDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O elemento principal <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EntityDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports deletes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> controlo suporta eliminações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if deletes are supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se forem suportadas eliminações; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports inserts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> inserções de suporte de controlo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if inserts are supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se forem suportadas inserções; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports paging through data returned by a query.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> controlo suporta paginação através de dados devolvidos por uma consulta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for suportada paginação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> controlo suporta uma vista ordenada da origem de dados subjacente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if sorting is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a ordenação é suportada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"></xref> control supports updates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceView"> </xref> objeto que está associado a atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource"> </xref> controlo suporta atualizações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if updates are supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as atualizações são suportadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os dados de tempo de criação que corresponde ao esquema do controlo de origem de dados associados ao utilizar o número de linhas especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se os dados de exemplo ou dados reais.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas a devolver.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que os dados devolvidos são dados de exemplo <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que os dados devolvidos são dados dinâmicos.

trans-unit.source: The data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para apresentar no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o esquema que descreve a vista de origem de dados que é representada pelo objeto vista atual.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the schema.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o esquema.
